Text: FW vacation time Cc Hi Vince I will be out of the office next week I sent this email to Therese and Shirley to take care of it If you need me you can reach me at my cell phone thanks again for all your support mauricio Original Message From Mora Mauricio Sent Friday January AM To Candella Therese Crenshaw Shirley Cc Subject vacation time Hi Therese I need to take days off next week monday through thursday Please use my discretionary day personal day and vacation time for that purpose Also would you please mail my paystub from next Thursdays My last paystub Jan is not in the mail box I think I asked Shirley to keep it If she has it pelase mail both of them as I wont be in the office on Thrusday my info is Mauricio Mora Winrock Blvd Houston TX Home Mauricio Mora Enron Research Group
Out of Office AutoReply Florencia Morapst As of January I am no longer with Enron please contact me at mailto

Florencia Mora Cc Dear friends and collegues Im pleased to announce the birth of Florencia Mora She was born today at AM at Hermann Hospital Rosalia and Florencia are healthy and happy and will be back at home by Thursday Regards Mauricio

holidaysHi Vince I will be on vacation from Dec until January th I wish you all the best in these holidays and I want to express my gratitude for your support during the recent events at Enron Mauricio Mora Enron Research Group
